channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft .NET Framework
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft .NET Framework

item.title: CVE-2017-8759|2024-09-17T01:56:49.985Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20.net%20framework
item.description: Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0, 3.5, 3.5.1, 4.5.2, 4.6, 4.6.1, 4.6.2 and 4.7 allow an attacker to execute code remotely via a malicious document or application, aka ".NET Framework Remote Code Execution Vulnerability."
